Sentencas: Gas turbine output has a very good capability for heat recovery and increases production capacity by heat recovery steam generator and heat recovery vapor generator.
Titulo: Optimal design and analysis of a combined freshwater-power generation system based on integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-organic Rankine cycle-multi effect distillation system

Sentencas: Also, gas turbines have good potential for coupling with a solid oxide fuel cell to increase power generation.
Titulo: Optimal design and analysis of a combined freshwater-power generation system based on integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-organic Rankine cycle-multi effect distillation system

Sentencas: The present research proposes and evaluates a novel combination of a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine system with an organic Rankine cycle and a multi-effect thermal desalination system.
Titulo: Optimal design and analysis of a combined freshwater-power generation system based on integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-organic Rankine cycle-multi effect distillation system

Sentencas: Conventional and advanced exergetic, exergoenvironmental and exergoeconomic analyses are performed to better understand the proposed system in view of performance, economic, and environmental impacts.
Titulo: Optimal design and analysis of a combined freshwater-power generation system based on integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-organic Rankine cycle-multi effect distillation system

Sentencas: To find the optimal design values, minimize the total exergetic environmental impacts and total exergetic cost rate, and maximize exergetic efficiency, as objective functions, multi-target optimization using the multi-target water cycle algorithm and the multi-target genetic algorithm is used.
Titulo: Optimal design and analysis of a combined freshwater-power generation system based on integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-organic Rankine cycle-multi effect distillation system

Sentencas: The analyses are conducted using MATLAB software.
Titulo: Optimal design and analysis of a combined freshwater-power generation system based on integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-organic Rankine cycle-multi effect distillation system

Sentencas: Results determine the optimal hybrid system could produce 5000 m(3)/day of freshwater, with five effects on the MED-TVC.
Titulo: Optimal design and analysis of a combined freshwater-power generation system based on integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-organic Rankine cycle-multi effect distillation system

Sentencas: The energy and exergy efficiencies of the suggested hybrid system reached 47.85% and 41.94%, respectively, an increase of 11.6% and 3.6% compared to the coupled gas turbine system and solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Optimal design and analysis of a combined freshwater-power generation system based on integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-organic Rankine cycle-multi effect distillation system

Sentencas: Furthermore, by applying the Multi-objective Genetic Algorithm and Multi-objective Water Cycle Algorithm optimization, the overall efficiency of cogeneration is increased by 28% and 27.5%.
Titulo: Optimal design and analysis of a combined freshwater-power generation system based on integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-organic Rankine cycle-multi effect distillation system

Sentencas: The total exergetic cost is reduced by 23.12% and 22.46%, and the total exergetic environmental impact is reduced by 20.15% and 19.65%, respectively.
Titulo: Optimal design and analysis of a combined freshwater-power generation system based on integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-organic Rankine cycle-multi effect distillation system
